tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Painful Teething,Cavities,Painless Single visit root canal treatment,
review: We visited Dr Deepesh for my 4 year old daughter's tooth problem. Sir is very patient in explaining the problem. Did root canal for two teeths. Because of his friendliness my daughter allowed him to do the procedure. We are very happy with the whole experience and I would recommend anyone who has kid.Before this Clove dental already told me that there is no solution except root canal for all the 8 teeth. We were so worried. But sir took the case so calmly and explained different solution which worked for us very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Good explanation of treatment options and outcomes, warm and friendly demeanour, scheduled appointment and on time consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As we came to the right place for my kid dental issues after visiting multiple clinics.My kid was suffering with dental issues and for that we visited many clinics but all of them suggested complex treatment which she cannot cooperate with that.But at Giggles, Dr Deepesh Singh knows how to handle the kids very well.we undergone through 100% painless treatment and my kid is doing well after that.Thank you sir for treating my kid.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Deepesh Singh is awesome dental doctor. He explained us the treatment when we went for our kid dental problems. He made him very comfortable and the dental checking setup is really amazing. Kids will not feel it is a health care setup but as a friendly play area. Dr. Deepesh suggested progressive treatment instead of the extraction which might be problematic.  There is no wait time if you book prior appointment which is very good. Would like to recommend him for any kids dental checkup. His smiling and friendly greeting, always make us comfortable.
reply_text: Thank you for taking valuable time out and providing encouragement. friendly , stress free care is our hallmark. We always spend maximum time on understanding your issue and discussing the options before the treatment.happy to help

tags: None
review: Dr Deepesh was very patient and gentle with my 4 yr old. Took time to explain the root of the problem. Ensured my kid was comfortable and he connected well with him.  Did not push anything drastic as first measures which is highly appreciated by us. Found a good dentist in Dr Deepesh for my kid!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We booked for a video consultation, 30 minutes. Doctor arrived on time but spent just 5 minutes before leaving for another work (OT case). I don't understand when I blocked the time for my consultation, how can I not get the full time? Yes, 5 minutes for ~550 Rs. I couldn't get to ask the questions I have prepared because of the rush created. All I was told was don't go for extraction. Later after an hour, the doctor messaged back in WhatsApp and answered couple of questions. Again the same response. I should have thought twice before booking. Disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** ** *** **** ********* ******* ******** *** ***** We see Dr. Deepesh and he is so patient with my kiddos. The staff is welcoming and nice, most importantly they help my kids relax and have a good experience at the dentist. The office is so kid friendly and that makes our visits be fun. I feel like they provided a lot useful information in every one of our visits. Dr. Deepesh never rushes us, but always explains what is going on with our kids and what his recommendations are. Highly recommend this practice, specially if you have little ones who are nervous about seeing the dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Teeth Grinding,Dental Cavities,Dental Calculus,
review: Me and my wife visited the doctor for cavities and other dental issues. Starting with the environment as the Covid scare is still on! - The team at Giggles make sure that you feel safe during the visit and all the precautions are taken. Dr. Deepesh was extremely helpful and so patient! He made sure all the issues were discussed properly by asking different questions and making sure we did not have any doubts left unanswered. We got the cavities treated and filled and never once felt being rushed (which usually most doctors do!!) Sneha Ma'am helped with tooth cleaning and scaling with great patience and finess. They reach out for regular follow-ups to ensure the treatment is working and if there are any additional questions.Overall extremely satisfied and highly recommend Dr. Deepesh and his team for all kind of dental consulting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was very good in explaining the problem and guided us the remedies and procedures to fix it. Environment was friendly so it was very easy to express our thoughts and doubts and get them clarified. Good part was the patient gets sufficient time to discuss about the issue. He makes sure that the patient or guardian is clear about the condition, if not, he clears it patiently. My kid feels comfortable in visiting this dental premises. Kids are handled  with care and gets easily adjusted with the doctor. I would definitely recommend him for pediatric dental issues - Vihanka P

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

I would give 100/100 Doctor is too good and gives advise and complete understanding to us before they prevent and cure.
Where ever we visit they take consultation fee etc before they proceed. 
But in giggles they prevent and cure  first.
I would recommend Giggles****** ************ **** ****

review:
I actually went there for second opinion for filling my tooth. Because the other doctor whom i visited before not explained clearly  what the problem is n was suggesting root canal directly n charged too much for basic check-up . 
But I should say Dr.deepesh singh and team is the BEST  i visited ever, true professional and friendly. He makes sure u understand clearly what problem u have n the remedy/ action which they are going to provide.

why i preferred this doctor:
No baseless charges.
No action without understanding the problem we are suffering with.
He will explain clearly about the problem n remedy/ course of action to fix
reply_text: Thank you for the heartfelt words and encouragement. Keeps us motivated to do the best.

review: What a thorough professional Dr. Deepesh is, we went for our 6.5 years old daughter as she was suffering from severe tooth pain. Being new in Hyderabad, we searched for paediatric dentist near by, we got his reference and went to his clinic. From day one till now our experience has been more then satisfactory. His clinic is great for kids as kids don’t feel that they are there for any treatment, we were amazed to see our daughter sitting on Dental chair getting treated for straight one hour without any complaints. This is purely because of Dr. Deepesh’s way of handling patients, *** ********** His treatment has been more than satisfactory and the way he deals with his kids patients is appreciable, he explains everything in detail. Our daughter has been getting well treated and we would highly recommend Dr.Deepesh for any dental treatment.
reply_text: Thanks you sir.  We really appreciate that you took the time  to write extensively about your  experience.  Your trust and confidence are a huge boost to us to keep getting better.
